p: Matrigel was diluted with serum-free medium, and 200 μL of diluent was added into a 24-well plate and maintained at 37°C for 1 hour. Then, 1 × 10 5 human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVECs) were treated with trypsin, resuspended in serum-free medium, and gently seeded on Matrigel-coated wells. Two hours later, cells were treated with EECP (25, 50, or 100 μg/mL) and LPS (1 μg/mL). Endothelial cell tube formation was photographed through an inverted microscope at 6 h. The total tube numbers and branches were calculated using ImageJ software.
